Detailed Description

Date:
08-20-2001
Author:
Eric Crahen
Version:
1.0

This tool allows a Figure to be added to a Diagram model. The FigureTool will accept an instance of a Figure to use as a protoype. Each time the tool is invoked, the prototype is clone()ed and shaped to the correct size. If the user does not drag the mouse to shape the cloned Figure then it is set to the default size suplpied by prototype object.
